body.name: Mixing Bowls with Airtight Lids Set, 26PCS Stainless Steel Khaki Bowls with Grater Attachments, Non-Slip Bottoms & Kitchen Gadgets Set, Size 7, 4, 2.5, 2.0,1.5, 1QT, Great for Mixing & Serving

features: AIRTIGHT LIDS & 3 GRATER ATTACHMENTS The airtight lids that come with this mixing bowl set make it easy to store ingredients and leftovers without worrying about spills or leaks. 3.5qt had a removable lid inside the main lid, for adding contents or pairing it with your blender without removing the entire lid to prevent splash. This bowl set comes with 3 different grater attachments (slicing/grating/shredding) just shred or slice right into the bowl! Perfect for preparing salads!

NON-SLIP SILICONE BOTTOMS The rubber on the bottom of the mixing bowls is great for gripping and staying put which prevents sliding on the countertops when mixing and also protects the desk from high temperatures. There is no doubt that the silicone base is more wear-resistant, you do not need to worry about the wear of the stainless steel bowl bottom caused by long-term use

NESTING BOWLS & DISHWASHER SAFE These kitchen serving bowls can be nested together and offer space-efficient storage in neat kitchen cupboards. The mirrored interior makes cleaning a breeze, This mixing bowl set also is dishwasher-safe, just put it in the dishwasher after use, and you will get a new bowl set. But pay attention that it's best to hand wash the lids, as the heat of the dishwasher can warp them

6 SIZES BOWLS & EXTRA KITCHEN TOOLS SET The range of sizes from 7QT down to 1QT, makes this set incredibly versatile and suitable for a wide range of tasks. Each bowl comes with a QT label to make it easier to choose the right size, Bowl sizes fit on standard-size refrigerator shelves and cabinets. Comes with a brush, spatula, whisk, measuring spoons, and so on allowing you to save money on tools

PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL The stainless steel construction is durable for many years. This bowl set is constructed of a mirror-finish interior and matte-finish exterior ensuring dent resistance and rustproof. Food-grade stainless steel will not corrode or produce spots after long time use, please attention that after each cleaning, it is necessary to dry the inside with a cloth to prevent the corrosion of the remaining water on the bowl

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very convenient good purchase
reviews.reviewText: I saw someone post a reel of this stainless steel bowl set on Instagram so I decided to give it a try. In terms of convenience, it’s great. I love that each bowl comes with the lid and it’s very easy to store salads or anything leftover. The only complaint I have is that after washing the water stains remain on the stainless steel material, even when I dry them with a cloth. Otherwise it’s still a really really good purchase and I’m still pretty happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Value and Great Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: Note: This brief review is completely voluntary.I'm very pleased with this purchase as it suits my needs perfectly and offers good value for the price. Everything was unused, in perfect condition, and packaged properly. My main reason for purchasing was the bowls/lids. The additional cooking tools are a useful extra, but I have not used the grating inserts as I already have tools I use for such needs.My main reason for posting a review is to point out that the lids should be hand-washed and not cleaned in a dishwasher. The lid on my large bowl warped as a result of it being cleaned in a dishwasher. I contacted customer service via Amazon and the person I communicated with went above and beyond in helping me with this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice set, stores well!
reviews.reviewText: Great value, lighter weight than expected, but quite functional!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This set is great! The bowls feel really high quality, and I love that they have a non-slip bottom to them to stop them sliding about when you are using them. All the lids fit perfectly, and no scratches on them so far. Love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good bowls.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these because they were pretty and functional. I love that they are nesting bowls and that they all have matching lids. The non-slip bottoms work great to keep the bowls in place. I only have 2 complaints; one is that I wish the cheese grater would fit into the center of any bowl. It only works with the second largest bowl, and second, is the actual grater is a little flimsy. It is easily bent so you have to take care when washing/storing it. Other than that I really like them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You NEED this!
reviews.reviewText: Super convenient. I absolutely love the lids and all of the accessories. This comes in handy for prepping food as well as storing it. They're actually so nice that you could probably serve from them as well. Love the quality and Packaging. Everything can be stored inside the largest bowl so it is not hard to store or take up lots of space.Update- Missing pieces 🫠 I don't want to send it back. Hopefully the seller will send the 2 items I don't have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful and a great deal
reviews.reviewText: This set of bowls are really amazing. The silicone bottom really hugs your counter so you don’t have to worry about it slipping. The lids fit perfectly & are designed to make them easy to stack. The inserts for grating or slicing promise a neat and tidy task well done. And the added bonus of measuring spoons, measuring cups, a small whisk and small to tongs makes this a wonderful “complete kitchen “ gift !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the non-slip bottom!
reviews.reviewText: I really like the set of pans. Very good quality and great price. My favorite part is the non-slip bottom.

reviews.reviewTitle: Para alguien que va iniciando en la cocina es un excelente producto 👍🏻
reviews.reviewText: La verdad por todo lo que incluye el paquete esta genial. Si alguien va empezando y quiero tener un buen set de cocina inicial este es ideal. 10/10

Kommen wir erstmal zum positiven, die Schüsseln sind schön, handlich und recht groß. Gut finde ich den Silikon Boden, denn dieser verhindert dass die Schüssel weg rutscht. Außerdem nimmt das set nicht viel Platz in Anspruch.Der Versand hat jedoch total lange gedauert und zudem wurde unnötig viel Plastik verwendet!!Der Verkäufer wirbt mit einem Foto wo der Aufsatz die Gurken in Scheiben schneiden soll. Leider ist dies nicht möglich, mit keinem der angekommenen Aufsätze!!! Der Aufsatz der dies tun sollte hat eine geriffelte Seite statt zwei glatte. Unglaublich dass hier mit Sachen geworben werden, welche nicht eingehalten werden können. Schade, vorallem für den Preis!
Fue regalo de bodas y les encantó viene súper completo
